title: Tether releases new reserve attestation, reinforces backing
summary: The latest USDT reserve attestation highlights higher treasury exposure and stronger capital buffers, reducing near-term depeg risk.

opinion_annotations.reason: Higher reserves make a sustained depeg less likely in the coming months.

title: Ethereum core devs lock in spring upgrade schedule
summary: Developers finalize timelines for the next network upgrade, keeping staking rewards steady while preparing data-availability improvements.

opinion_annotations.reason: Clear upgrade cadence reduces execution risk and keeps the ATH narrative alive.

title: Kraken quietly beefs up compliance hires ahead of rumored IPO
summary: The exchange added senior compliance staff in the US and UK, a typical move before filing S-1 paperwork.

opinion_annotations.reason: Compliance ramp signals IPO readiness, improving odds of a filing before 2026.

title: Ukraine and Russia confirm new prisoner exchange talks
summary: Negotiators will meet next week to finalize terms, with a ceasefire framework reportedly on the agenda.

opinion_annotations.reason: Direct talks raise the probability of a formal ceasefire before Q3 ends.

title: New zk-rollup confirms token generation event in Q3
summary: The team announced an audit window and airdrop criteria, pointing to a summer TGE if timelines hold.

opinion_annotations.reason: Public timelines and audits de-risk the launch schedule, boosting odds of a 2025 TGE.
